title: Trisomy 13-1
growth_protocol_ch1: Cells were grown for 48 hours and 2 x 10^5 cells were harvested between 50 to 70% confluency. Cells were maintained in Minimum Essential Media (MEM with NEAA; Gibco 10370088) supplemented with 15 % FBS and 2 mM L-glutamine.
extract_protocol_ch1: The RNAeasy Kit from Qiagen (cat # 74104) was used to purify the RNA and a nanoDrop was used to measure concentration. Samples were shipped for on dried ice for transcriptome sequencing to BGI
data_processing: Paired-end reads were aligned to human primary genome hg38, with star_2.5.3a 1, annotated with GENECODE GRCh38.p12 annotation release 292.
data_processing.1: Aligned exon fragments with mapping quality higher than 20 were counted toward gene expression with featureCounts_1.5.2 3
data_processing.2: Expression normalization was performed using the TPM (Transcripts Per Kilobase Million) method.
contact_department: Department of Molecular, Cell and Cancer Biology
